Description:
Required Skills to be successfulExperience in implementing talent review, talent identification and succession planning, defining career and learning paths across job families.
Experience delivering various leadership skills courses to supervisor levels/middle managers with strong knowledge of leadership theories, models, and best practices, with the ability to apply them to real-world scenarios.
Experience implementing coaching and mentoring programs/solutions for leaders. What equips you for the roleBachelor's degree in Human Resources, Organizational Development, Business Administration, or related field (Master's degree preferred).
Minimum 2-3 years of experience in leadership development, talent management and L&D or related roles
Strong reporting and analytical skills backed by advanced excel capability. Preferable experienced in creating dashboards to support data-driven decisions using various tools administer and debrief various psychometric tools preferable (e.g. Hogan, SHL, etc). Job Details
